content: Saturday: Bought groceries ($15.39 + $25.03) at two different stores. Dropped off three pieces for alterations and dry cleaning ($67).Sunday: Added $10 to my MetroCard. Sephora order got charged ($67.84). Bought a top from a consignment shop (used up my store credit, then $33.98 in cash). Bought some fast food ($4.87).Total: $224.11
